website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a case for larger binoculars, consider this rugged, durable case from Steiner.
pros: Holds binoculars measuring 15 by 80 millimeters, or 20 by 80 millimeters
Case features a soft, protective inner shell

customer_reviews.title: Single purpose done very well
customer_reviews.text: I don't know of any way they could have done it any better. The Binoculars, mine are 20x80, slip fit into a inner pocket protected by a soft outer shell of protective material and finished with a very durable outer material. The inner liner makes a very good protective enclosure for the quality Binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Item received did not match picture when ordered.
customer_reviews.text: The case I received did not match the picture you see with this review. Also, when I clicked on the original picture prior to ordering, it did not match the item I received. The pictures showed a blue case with attached water bottle which I did not receive. The case looks good but I am not pleased with the pictures not matching what I received.
customer_reviews.author: dirks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, robust bag as expected. It's a 'Ronseal bag'. Does exactly what it says on the tin!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Clegg

customer_reviews.title: steiner bag
customer_reviews.text: good bag for protect of my 1200.00 binoculars. the description stated it had a internal accessory pocket, IT DOES NOT. Only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: avf

customer_reviews.title: I feel like an idiot
customer_reviews.text: Many reviews said that the item shipped was not the same as that shown. Since it had been a bit since the last review I thought/hoped the seller had probably corrected the problem. Nope, I was an optimist. The part shown had a buckle and padding. The item shipped me was thin nylon with a zipper, that was probably worth about $5. Interestingly the plastic bag it came in was labeled "Steiner 610".
customer_reviews.author: P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: An unnecessary, duplicate bag.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is good, but I discovered I didn't need it, because an identical bag comes with the binoculars. I think it is intentionally deceptive to offer it as an addition to that which comes with the binoculars. I would not have bought it if I had known this.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: The Only Real Steiner Binobag Sold By Amazon...
customer_reviews.text: This is the real Steiner Binobag... Unlike the other Bag sold by Amazon this one is made by Steiner Optics and has excellent quality. At this price its a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: WESSEC

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size?
customer_reviews.text: The product description says it's 10 x 6 x 4. What Amazon sent me, was 7.5 x 6 x 3.25 outside dimensions, and inside dimensions 6.5 x 5.5 x 2.5. I can still use it, I like the way the front flap can zip open on three sides, but it's not at all what I expected. Either I got sent the wrong item or someone at Amazon is really bad at measuring.
customer_reviews.author: The Lawn RangerTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Umm... I bought this because I recently bought a pair of compact sized Military/Marine Steiner 8x30 nocs off Amazon at the same time (not realizing till after I purchased them, that they came with a Steiner sweet case) and just wanted an extra, I suppose rugged bag to take out with on hikes and the like. Once again, I purchase THIS bag thinking that I was to receive what is pictured with the item description here. I didn't only not receive the black bag with "Binobag" on it, but an actual Steiner brand noc case... so Yeah! I am REALLY Glad I bought this item! Satisfied customer right here ladies and gents!
customer_reviews.author: Salzighünd

customer_reviews.title: The black bag is not what I thought it is.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the binoculars without knowing that they come with a bag. In addition, the black bag that I saw on Amazon was of different design, cushioned. The black bag is identical to the one that comes with the binoculars. I would like to return the black bag.
customer_reviews.author: Adi Kahan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good case, should have come with the glasses, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: John VanHuysen

customer_reviews.title: I returned the case because the binoculars came with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned the case because the binoculars came with a case, but failed to write that on the item site. This case looked just as advertised. But we didn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: My Steiner 10X42 binoculars fit very nicely. Padding is minimal
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and as advertised. My Steiner 10X42 binoculars fit very nicely. Padding is minimal. I might augment the padding. Solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: aslamtu

customer_reviews.title: Binobag shipped is not like the picture -Buyer beware-
customer_reviews.text: The bag pictured is not the bag I received. If you are looking for a hinge lid bag this is not for you. The bag I received was nylon with a zipper closure like the one I was replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Steiner Binobag was an excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this Steiner binobag. It was a perfect fit for my 60's era 8x30 Prestige binoculars. The original case for the binoculars was literally falling apart and I needed something compact, lightweight and yet would provide protection for the binoculars. This was perfect and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: jethroa

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality prduct. It provides great protection and is very durable but lightweight. I would certainly reccomend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: B Janey Pullen

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 7 x 35 Binocs. A little expensive but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: JLin

customer_reviews.title: Bino Bag
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of carrying 8x30 steiners aroung in what was handy. Real sturdy padded product.Not that bulky.Good to go here.
customer_reviews.author: Ryoiter

customer_reviews.title: excellent case and you can use it to store the ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent case and you can use it to store the binoculars and maybe you can fit another small one next to it
customer_reviews.author: nehad

customer_reviews.title: This is a WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Better than advertised! Came with a strap that was not listed. New with tags in plastic wrapper instead of used which is what was listed and for which I PAID! A very pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: cheap zippered!
customer_reviews.text: small cheap zippered case not the large flip top case!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blackwater contractor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fit my binos perfect. Great case, although I thought a little expensive for a case.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but great quality! Lightweight and rugged, perfect for a Steiner military binocular.
customer_reviews.author: S. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: This case worked fine for my 40-year-old 7x35 binoculars. Adding a few extra words here to meet silly word number requirement.
customer_reviews.author: Trax falqim

customer_reviews.title: We received a very small bag with zipper and no ...
customer_reviews.text: We received a very small bag with zipper and no strap per the picture. It is not the flip top case that is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag, didn't need it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the binoculars I bought came with a bag, so it wasn't necessary, however, it is a nice bag and we are going to use it for some old binoculars and some other stuff. Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L. Etter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful carrying case
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful carrying case. Holds the binoculars well. I just wish that there was a separate compartment for carrying a cleaning cloth or maps.
customer_reviews.author: S. DeMilo

customer_reviews.title: No measuring required.
customer_reviews.text: If one selects on the size of the Binoculars it works fine. A 10X50 fits, but if doing more that just using it as a suitcase travel case, some additional padding like a soft towel might be used.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bezos Slave

customer_reviews.title: BAG COMES WITH THE 7 X 50 STEINER MARINER
customer_reviews.text: ORDERED BAG SEPARATE, DIDN'T SEE THAT THE STEINER MARINER INCLUDED THE BAG WITH THE BINOCULARS. BAG LOOKS GOOD, LOOKS WELL MADE.
customer_reviews.author: B Man

customer_reviews.title: Bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband Steiner binoculars. He preferred this bag over the one that came with the binoculars. Very convenient and portable.
customer_reviews.author: BritHilt

customer_reviews.title: its very good
customer_reviews.text: for save ur stiner i like it and i buy more for my friends in 6 month ago its nice
customer_reviews.author: PREPAID

customer_reviews.title: very good binocular bag
customer_reviews.text: I have an old world War 11 era pair of binoculars and leather bag which has long been too dried out and weak to use with the binoculars. It was difficult to find a size match replacement bag because more modern binoculars are smaller as well as the carrying bags they use. This Steiner Binobag fits like a custom made binocular bag and is much lighter, making it easier to carry and use my fine old pair of 7x50 binculars.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag for my Steiner binocs
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made, and my Steiner 7x50 marine binocs fit in the bag perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rhon Herndon

product_meta.title: Steiner X Large Gear Bag for 15x80, 20x80 or 25x80 Binoculars
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
If your Steiner Binocular model does not include a case, you may want to select this case from their catalog. Steiner also offers different carrying options with a variety of strap and harness systems.

 The Steiner Premier Bag for 15x80 & 20x80 binoculars holds your Steiner binoculars plus other equipment in exterior zippered compartments. The Steiner Premier Bag is constructed of durable nylon and padded for protection.
